publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5151 Patricia Ferguson: Young Possil Futures Shortlisted for The People’s Millions—That the Parliament congratulates Young Possil Futures on being shortlisted to go forward to The People’s Millions public vote that will take place on 24 November 2009; notes that the nomination is in respect of the Get Up and Go Activity project that will create opportunities for young people aged between five and 18 to experience and participate in a wide range of outdoor activities and will help to address the issue of territorial boundaries and encourage young people to work as a team, and wishes the project every success.
